channel.title: Testscape not saving what I change to my char?
channel.description:
How come when I open up my testscape source folder and open up the characters folder and see my name Lin in like a wordpad thing (I usually open up with testpad) and change something like my character rights and save it nothing happens? I use my server as my ham I.P. (which works for me and other people), nothing (Blank as I.P.) and hybridscape (pointless). And when I log on after i change something, it wouldn't work. I'd save too. And when I logged on and off, what I changed would be back to 0.
For example
character-rights = 0 change to.... character-rights = 3
I'd save and nothing would happen... Can someone tell me what's wrong and how to fix it?

item.title: Testscape not saving what I change to my char?
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

Then go to Character file, select your name. Find player rights and change 0 to 3. That worked on me one time I used TestScape

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape not saving what I change to my char?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

kk lol. im sorry.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 05:08:23 PM[/size][hr]When i extracted it, its name was client with 3 books… (because of winrar) and thats what i search in? because when i open the not extracted file i set it to always open with textpad.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 05:11:55 PM[/size][hr]Yeah. I found what you were telling me. I changed it to my name… Nothing happened. And I had to click on find player rights 4 times… lol

item.title: Testscape not saving what I change to my char?
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

Then when you download a file you need to use WinRAR to extract to your desktop or documents.

Rightclick the file, and click “extract to…”

The server source file you downloaded.

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape not saving what I change to my char?
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

You need to extract it to your desktop or documents in able to HOST it anyways…

If you can’t do that you aren’t going to be able to host a server.

You need a program like WinRAR - Link Here to unzip.

Read full topic

If it isn’t viewable by you, I suggest you don’t make a private server.
